channel.title: [Added] Update Currency Codelist to show VES - Bolivar Soberano
channel.description:
We are updating the IATI Currency Codelist to bring it in line with changes to the ISO 4217 Currency codelist: http://www.iso.org/iso/home/standards/currency_codes.htm
Notable changes are:
VER - Bolivar has been withdrawn
The new code VES has been added: VES - Bolivar Soberano
See the relevant pull request [here](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/278)
